General.Name: Jiangsu Tongli Risheng Machinery Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Jiangsu Tongli Risheng Machinery Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells elevator components in China and internationally. The company provides escalator parts, including skirts, covers, glass supports, railings, handrail swivels, etc.; drive systems, such as drive assemblies, ladder guide rails, handrail guide rails, etc.; escalator trusses; elevator metal materials; and various other parts for escalators. It also offers straight ladder parts comprising well components, guide rail brackets, traction machine brackets, counterweight frames, protective screen assemblies, buffer brackets, etc.; and car parts, including car upper/lower beams, straight beams, car tops/bottoms, car bottom brackets, car walls, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Danyang, China.
